author: Cult_Of_Skaro
title: 2587 Play Train
review:
I got this when I was about two, and was considered unworthy for LEGO. On to the review. 

Box/Instructions

Boring. I see no interest in these whatsoever.

Parts

Primo parts are pretty much non-reusable, and besides, there's only four.

Minifigures

I'm not sure if you can really count this as a minifig, but okay. At least he's Danish plastic. 

The build

There is no build. All you do is stick two one-piece cars on the end of a one-piece engine.

The completed model

It's not a model for the same reasons mentioned above.

Summary

Unless you're a collector of rare sets like @Istokg, I would not advise buying this. It's not really a set. I only hold on to it for sentimental value (and the pleasure of being one of eight owners of the set).
